WITH CombinedMessages AS (SELECT rm.id AS id, rm.member_id AS member_id, rm.sender_id AS participant_id, m.message_content, m.updated_date, 'received' AS message_type, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY m.updated_date ORDER BY m.updated_date) AS row_num FROM tbl_receive_message rm JOIN tbl_message m ON rm.id = m.id WHERE rm.sender_id = #{participantId} AND rm.receive_message_status = '정상'
UNION ALL
SELECT sm.id AS id, sm.member_id AS member_id, sm.receiver_id AS participant_id, m.message_content, m.updated_date, 'sent' AS message_type, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY m.updated_date ORDER BY m.updated_date) AS row_num FROM tbl_send_message sm JOIN tbl_message m ON sm.id = m.id WHERE sm.receiver_id = #{participantId} AND sm.receive_message_status = '정상')
SELECT * FROM CombinedMessages WHERE participant_id = #{participantId} ORDER BY updated_date, row_num;
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_receive_message (id, member_id, sender_id) VALUE (#{id}, #{memberId}, #{senderId})
insert into tbl_send_message (id, member_id, receiver_id) VALUE (#{id}, #{memberId}, #{receiverId})
